boofcv.factory.segmentation

Class ConfigSlic

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.factory.segmentation.ConfigSlic

  • public class ConfigSlic
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration used when creating SegmentSlic via FactoryImageSegmentation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boofcv.struct.ConnectRule connectRule
      Connection rule that is used when merging small regions.
      int numberOfRegions
      Number of regions which will be initially seeded.
      float spacialWeight
      Larger values place more weight on the spacial component.
      int totalIterations
      Number of mean-shift iterations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigSlic(int numberOfRegions) 
      ConfigSlic(int numberOfRegions, float spacialWeight) 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • numberOfRegions

        public int numberOfRegions
        Number of regions which will be initially seeded. The actually number of regions at the end will vary a bit due to merging of small regions and the image border.

      • spacialWeight

        public float spacialWeight
        Larger values place more weight on the spacial component. For 8-bit RGB a value of 200 works well.

      • totalIterations

        public int totalIterations
        Number of mean-shift iterations. Typically has converged by 10 iterations.

      • connectRule

        public boofcv.struct.ConnectRule connectRule
        Connection rule that is used when merging small regions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigSlic

        public ConfigSlic(int numberOfRegions)

      • ConfigSlic

        public ConfigSlic(int numberOfRegions,
                  float spacialWeight)
